original_title: Sri Lanka bonds opens steady, rupee 326.00/327.15 to dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka bonds opened steady, dealers said while the spot US dollar opened at 326.00/327.00 rupees.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 was quoted steady at 15.85/00 after closing at 15.90/16.00 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2028 was quoted at 15.05/15.10 steady from closing at 15.10/15 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted steady at 13.40/45 after closing at 13.30/40 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 was quoted steady at 14.30/15.50 after closing at 14.30/15.40 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 was quoted at 15.00/15.12 after closing at 14.80/15.10. (Colombo/July19/2023)
